It is<S>4851</S> not<S>3756</S> expedient<S>4851</S> for me<S>3427</S> doubtless<S>1211</S> to glory<S>2744</S>.<S>1063</S> I will come<S>2064</S> to<S>1519</S> visions<S>3701</S> and<S>2532</S> revelations<S>602</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>. <sup>I will come: Gr. For I will come</sup>
I knew<S>1492</S> a man<S>444</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S> above<S>4253</S> fourteen<S>1180</S> years<S>2094</S> ago<S>4253</S>, (whether<S>1535</S> in<S>1722</S> the body<S>4983</S>, I cannot<S>3756</S> tell<S>1492</S>; or whether<S>1535</S> out<S>1622</S> of the body<S>4983</S>, I cannot<S>3756</S> tell<S>1492</S>: God<S>2316</S> knoweth<S>1492</S>;) such an one<S>5108</S> caught up<S>726</S> to<S>2193</S> the third<S>5154</S> heaven<S>3772</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I knew<S>1492</S> such<S>5108</S> a man<S>444</S>, (whether<S>1535</S> in<S>1722</S> the body<S>4983</S>, or<S>1535</S> out<S>1622</S> of the body<S>4983</S>, I cannot<S>3756</S> tell<S>1492</S>: God<S>2316</S> knoweth<S>1492</S>;)
How that<S>3754</S> he was caught up<S>726</S> into<S>1519</S> paradise<S>3857</S>, and<S>2532</S> heard<S>191</S> unspeakable<S>731</S> words<S>4487</S>, which<S>3739</S> it is<S>1832</S> not<S>3756</S> lawful<S>1832</S> for a man<S>444</S> to utter<S>2980</S>. <sup>lawful: or, possible</sup>
Of<S>5228</S> such an one<S>5108</S> will I glory<S>2744</S>: yet<S>1161</S> of<S>5228</S> myself<S>1683</S> I will<S>2744</S> not<S>3756</S> glory<S>2744</S>, but<S>1508</S> in<S>1722</S> mine<S>3450</S> infirmities<S>769</S>.
For<S>1063</S> though<S>1437</S> I would desire<S>2309</S> to glory<S>2744</S>, I shall<S>2071</S> not<S>3756</S> be<S>2071</S> a fool<S>878</S>; for<S>1063</S> I will say<S>2046</S> the truth<S>225</S>: but<S>1161</S> now I forbear<S>5339</S>, lest<S>3361</S> any man<S>5100</S> should think<S>3049</S> of<S>1519</S> me<S>1691</S> above<S>5228</S> that which<S>3739</S> he seeth<S>991</S> me<S>3165</S> to be, or<S>2228</S> that he heareth<S>191</S> of<S>5100</S> <S>1537</S> me<S>1700</S>.
And<S>2532</S> lest<S>3363</S> I should be exalted above measure<S>5229</S> through the abundance<S>5236</S> of the revelations<S>602</S>, there was given<S>1325</S> to me<S>3427</S> a thorn<S>4647</S> in the flesh<S>4561</S>, the messenger<S>32</S> of Satan<S>4566</S> to<S>2443</S> buffet<S>2852</S> me<S>3165</S>, lest<S>3363</S> I should be exalted above measure<S>5229</S>.
For<S>5228</S> this thing<S>5127</S> I besought<S>3870</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> thrice<S>5151</S>, that<S>2443</S> it might depart<S>868</S> from<S>575</S> me<S>1700</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he said<S>2046</S> unto me<S>3427</S>, My<S>3450</S> grace<S>5485</S> is sufficient<S>714</S> for thee<S>4671</S>: for<S>1063</S> my<S>3450</S> strength<S>1411</S> is made perfect<S>5048</S> in<S>1722</S> weakness<S>769</S>. Most gladly<S>2236</S> therefore<S>3767</S> will I<S>2744</S> rather<S>3123</S> glory<S>2744</S> in<S>1722</S> my<S>3450</S> infirmities<S>769</S>, that<S>2443</S> the power<S>1411</S> of Christ<S>5547</S> may rest<S>1981</S> upon<S>1909</S> me<S>1691</S>.
Therefore<S>1352</S> I take pleasure<S>2106</S> in<S>1722</S> infirmities<S>769</S>, in<S>1722</S> reproaches<S>5196</S>, in<S>1722</S> necessities<S>318</S>, in<S>1722</S> persecutions<S>1375</S>, in<S>1722</S> distresses<S>4730</S> for<S>5228</S> Christ's<S>5547</S> sake<S>5228</S>: for<S>1063</S> when<S>3752</S> I am weak<S>770</S>, then<S>5119</S> am<S>1510</S> I strong<S>1415</S>.
I am become<S>1096</S> a fool<S>878</S> in glorying<S>2744</S>; ye<S>5210</S> have compelled<S>315</S> me<S>3165</S>: for<S>1063</S> I<S>1473</S> ought<S>3784</S> to have been commended<S>4921</S> of<S>5259</S> you<S>5216</S>: for<S>1063</S> in nothing<S>3762</S> am I behind<S>5302</S> the very chiefest<S>3029</S> apostles<S>652</S> <S>5228</S>, though<S>1499</S> I be<S>1510</S> nothing<S>3762</S>.
Truly<S>3303</S> the signs<S>4592</S> of an apostle<S>652</S> were wrought<S>2716</S> among<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S> in<S>1722</S> all<S>3956</S> patience<S>5281</S>, in<S>1722</S> signs<S>4592</S>, and<S>2532</S> wonders<S>5059</S>, and<S>2532</S> mighty deeds<S>1411</S>.
For<S>1063</S> what<S>5101</S> is it<S>2076</S> wherein<S>3739</S> ye were inferior<S>2274</S> to<S>5228</S> other<S>3062</S> churches<S>1577</S>, except<S>1508</S> it be that<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> myself<S>846</S> was<S>2655</S> not<S>3756</S> burdensome<S>2655</S> to you<S>5216</S>? forgive<S>5483</S> me<S>3427</S> this<S>5026</S> wrong<S>93</S>.
Behold<S>2400</S>, the third time<S>5154</S> I am<S>2192</S> ready<S>2093</S> to come<S>2064</S> to<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>; and<S>2532</S> I will<S>2655</S> not<S>3756</S> be burdensome<S>2655</S> to you<S>5216</S>: for<S>1063</S> I seek<S>2212</S> not<S>3756</S> yours<S>5216</S>, but<S>235</S> you<S>5209</S>: for<S>1063</S> the children<S>5043</S> ought<S>3784</S> not<S>3756</S> to lay up<S>2343</S> for the parents<S>1118</S>, but<S>235</S> the parents<S>1118</S> for the children<S>5043</S>.
And<S>1161</S> I<S>1473</S> will very gladly<S>2236</S> spend<S>1159</S> and<S>2532</S> be spent<S>1550</S> for<S>5228</S> you<S>5590</S> <S>5216</S>; though<S>1499</S> the more abundantly<S>4056</S> I love<S>25</S> you<S>5209</S>, the less<S>2276</S> I be loved<S>25</S>. <sup>for you: Gr. for your souls</sup>
But<S>1161</S> be it so<S>2077</S>, I<S>1473</S> did<S>2599</S> not<S>3756</S> burden<S>2599</S> you<S>5209</S>: nevertheless<S>235</S>, being<S>5225</S> crafty<S>3835</S>, I caught<S>2983</S> you<S>5209</S> with guile<S>1388</S>.
Did I make a gain<S>4122</S> <S>3361</S> of you<S>5209</S> by<S>1223</S> any<S>5100</S> of them<S>846</S> whom<S>3739</S> I sent<S>649</S> unto<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>?
I desired<S>3870</S> Titus<S>5103</S>, and<S>2532</S> with him I sent<S>4882</S> a brother<S>80</S>. Did<S>4122</S> <S>3387</S> Titus<S>5103</S> make a gain<S>4122</S> of you<S>5209</S>? walked we<S>4043</S> not<S>3756</S> in the same<S>846</S> spirit<S>4151</S>? walked we not<S>3756</S> in the same<S>846</S> steps<S>2487</S>?
Again<S>3825</S>, think ye<S>1380</S> that<S>3754</S> we excuse ourselves<S>626</S> unto you<S>5213</S>? we speak<S>2980</S> before<S>2714</S> God<S>2316</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S>: but<S>1161</S> we do all things<S>3956</S>, dearly beloved<S>27</S>, for<S>5228</S> your<S>5216</S> edifying<S>3619</S>.
For<S>1063</S> I fear<S>5399</S>, lest<S>3381</S> <S>4458</S>, when I come<S>2064</S>, I shall<S>2147</S> not<S>3756</S> find<S>2147</S> you<S>5209</S> such as<S>3634</S> I would<S>2309</S>, and that I<S>2504</S> shall be found<S>2147</S> unto you<S>5213</S> such as<S>3634</S> ye would<S>2309</S> not<S>3756</S>: lest<S>3381</S> <S>4458</S> there be debates<S>2054</S>, envyings<S>2205</S>, wraths<S>2372</S>, strifes<S>2052</S>, backbitings<S>2636</S>, whisperings<S>5587</S>, swellings<S>5450</S>, tumults<S>181</S>:
And lest<S>3361</S>, when I come<S>2064</S> again<S>3825</S>, my<S>3450</S> God<S>2316</S> will humble<S>5013</S> me<S>3165</S> among<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>, and<S>2532</S> that I shall bewail<S>3996</S> many<S>4183</S> which<S>3588</S> have sinned already<S>4258</S>, and<S>2532</S> have<S>3340</S> not<S>3361</S> repented<S>3340</S> of<S>1909</S> the uncleanness<S>167</S> and<S>2532</S> fornication<S>4202</S> and<S>2532</S> lasciviousness<S>766</S> which<S>3739</S> they have committed<S>4238</S>.
